title: Harassment & Bullying
text: Content that targets a person or group with insults, threats, or demeaning language may be considered harassment. Repeated targeted insults or threats should be flagged.

title: Self-harm
text: Content encouraging self-harm or describing intent or methods in a way that enables harm should be blocked or escalated. Support-seeking content should be handled with care.

title: Hate
text: Content that attacks a protected group (based on race, religion, ethnicity, sexual orientation, etc.) may be hate speech. Direct slurs or dehumanization should be blocked.

title: Sexual content
text: Explicit sexual content involving minors must be blocked and escalated. Adult explicit content may be restricted depending on policy context.

title: Benign content
text: General neutral content that does not violate policy should be allowed.

title: Political persuasion
text: Political persuasion content may require labeling depending on jurisdiction and policy. Targeted persuasion or misinformation claims may require review.

title: Violence & Threats
text: Content promoting or describing violence against others, including threats, assault, or harm to individuals/groups should be blocked. This includes calls to action for violent behavior.

title: Misinformation
text: Content containing demonstrably false information that could cause harm, spread panic, or mislead people should be flagged for review. This includes conspiracy theories and manipulated media.

title: Illegal Activities
text: Content promoting or instructing on illegal activities such as drug manufacturing, hacking, fraud, or other criminal behavior should be blocked.

title: Drug Use
text: Content promoting illegal drug use, manufacturing, or distribution should be blocked. Educational content about drug effects may be allowed with appropriate warnings.

title: Weapons & Firearms
text: Content promoting illegal weapon possession, manufacturing, or use should be blocked. This includes instructions for making explosives or illegal firearms.

title: Child Safety
text: Content that could endanger children, including exploitation, abduction threats, or content that could be used to groom or harm minors should be blocked.

title: Spam & Advertising
text: Unsolicited commercial content, scams, or excessive promotional material should be flagged. This includes pyramid schemes and fraudulent offers.

title: Privacy Violations
text: Content that reveals personal information, doxxing, or violates privacy rights should be flagged for review.

title: Extremist Content
text: Content promoting extremist ideologies, terrorism, or radicalization should be blocked.
